translations.translation: when the mountains are set in motion,
The mountains made to move,
when the mountains shall be set in motion,
the mountains are scattered about as dust,
And when the mountains are driven.
And when the mountains are made to pass away;
And when the mountains are made to pass away,
when the mountains shall be set moving,
And when the hills are moved,
and when the mountains are moved,
And when the mountains shall be made to pass away,
when the mountains are set moving,
When the mountains vanish (like a mirage);
And when the mountains shall made to pass away;
and the mountains have been taken,
When the mountains are set in motion.
And when the mountains are removed
[81:3] and when the mountains are set in motion, [when] they are blown away from the face of the earth, becoming as scattered dust,
(And when the hills are moved) from above the surface of the earth

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ } معناهُ ذَهبتْ

translations.translation: And when the mountains are set in motion

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ } [التكوير: 3] يعني: سارت وانقلعت
 وطارت على أماكنها جبال الأنواع والأجناس الواقعة في عالم التعينات

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وإِذا الجبال سُيِّرتْ } عن أماكنها بالرجعة الحاصلة
 فتسير عن وجه الأرض حتى تبقى قاعاً صفصفاً لا ترى فيها عِوجاً ولا أمتاً
